articles.title: American Astronaut Returns To Earth On Russian Spacecraft Amid Ukraine Tensions - NDTV
articles.description: In a rare sign of cooperation between the U.S. and Russia, astronauts from both countries parachute-landed in Kazakhstan on Wednesday after a trip back to Earth from the International Space Station (ISS).
articles.content:
For US astronaut Vande Hei, it ended a US record-breaking stay in space.

articles.title: What's Up Doc? Is the COVID pandemic finally over? - MetroWest Daily News
articles.description: Although almost 77 percent of Americans have gotten at least one dose of a COVID-19 vaccine we still need to be on our guard.
articles.content:
Q:  Is the COVID pandemic finally over?

articles.title: U.S. officials authorize 4th dose of Pfizer COVID-19 shot for Americans 50 and up - CBC News
articles.description: U.S. regulators have authorized a fourth dose of Pfizer-BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine for Americans 50 and older because of concerns about waning immunity in the age group, the drugmakers said on Tuesday.
articles.content:
U.S. regulators have authorized a fourth dose of Pfizer-BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine for Americans 50 and older.
